definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
see 恣意妄為|恣意妄为[zi4 yi4 wang4 wei2]

sentences.english: Such chutzpah seems to be the key to Mr. Liao’s success.
sentences.chinese: 这种大胆妄为正是廖先生成功的关键。

sentences.english: It is audacious, disruptive and preposterous on the face of it.
sentences.chinese: 表面看来，其胆大妄为，且颠覆常理，又荒诞可笑。

sentences.english: The rebels went on an orgy of killing and destruction.
sentences.chinese: 叛乱者杀人破坏，肆意妄为。

sentences.english: I hope you will forgive me for my nerves .
sentences.chinese: 我希望你能原谅我的胆大妄为。

sentences.english: Here, Madoff made his most audacious innovation.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上，麦道夫创造了他最胆大妄为的发明。

sentences.english: The government is riding roughshod over the people's rights.
sentences.chinese: 政府恣意妄为不顾人民的权利。

sentences.english: He said this nuclear capability could embolden the government in Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 他说，这种核能力会使伊朗政府更加胆大妄为。

sentences.english: Such chutzpah seems to be the key to Mr.
sentences.chinese: 这种大胆妄为正是廖先生成功的关键。

sentences.english: Woe unto me, unto what am I likened ?
sentences.chinese: 三妄为我，祂什么我就好？

sentences.english: He worked with China to get new sanctions on rogue North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 他还与中国一起，对恣意妄为的朝鲜实施新的制裁。

sentences.english: And who in China would have the temerity to arrange such an encounter?
sentences.chinese: 中国又有谁能够如此胆大妄为地安排这种会见呢？

sentences.english: I will laugh unbridled, rampant cry.
sentences.chinese: 我要肆无忌惮的笑，肆意妄为的哭。

sentences.english: Day and night online, chat bubble sister, philandering, reckless.
sentences.chinese: 昼夜上网，聊天泡妹，打情骂俏，胆大妄为。

sentences.english: Gone were the days when they could do what they liked to the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 他们对中国人民恣意妄为的岁月一去不复返了。

sentences.english: Japan will reap as it has sown, if it continues to act recklessly.
sentences.chinese: 日方如继续恣意妄为，必将自食其果。

sentences.english: Why does David do these dare-devil deeds?
sentences.chinese: 大卫为什么会做出这些胆大妄为的事情呢？

definition: see 恣意妄為|恣意妄为[zi4 yi4 wang4 wei2]
to run amok (idiom); to commit outrages
regardless of the law and of natural morality (idiom); maverick/undisciplined and out of control
with no regard for law or discipline (idiom); flouting the law and disregarding all rules/in complete disorder
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
